thread.title: City Snapshot: Henkel posts double-digit growth in Q2
thread.title_full: City Snapshot: Henkel posts double-digit growth in Q2

title: City Snapshot: Henkel posts double-digit growth in Q2
text:
12 Aug 2015 | By Edward Devlin 
Persil owner Henkel has reported a “solid” performance in the second quarter with revenues up 13.5% to €4.7bn, driven by strong organic sales growth in emerging markets of 5.1%. Available to members only
